#summary The object alt attribute specifies alternate text that describes the element in case it can not be displayed or the browser does not support it.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-microsoft

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [ObjectElement <object> element] > *alt attribute*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `alt` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AppletElement <applet>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
  * [ImgElement <img>]
  * [ObjectElement <object>]
